post:
Techni Host is the very first web hosting company that provides live chat through webcam and voice! Customers need to see who is behind the computer. It gives them a better idea of whom they are speaking with. Starting today, we have released our all new Live Webcam Chat! We now provide support via:

1. Toll Free Telephone Number
2. Support Center (Tickets)
3. Forums
4. Live Chat (Webcam)
5. Live Chat (Text)
6. Email
7. Click To Call

We understand how important it is to be able to contact your web host as soon as an issue arises. For that reason we have made it so much easier for you to get a hold of us!

GHWH Program (Get Help Without Hosting Program)

Techni Host is also the first to offer the GHWH (Get Help Without Hosting) program! What this means is, if you don't have web hosting services with us, we will still support you! If you are tired of not being able to contact support with your current host, come to Techni Host. All you need to do is submit a ticket in our ticket center and place the ticket under the GHWH status. We will treat you just like you are one of our clients. There is no purchase necessary, and we will never pressure you into purchasing any of our services.

We also offer Windows VPS servers -> Click to Order Windows VPS!


[] 24/7/365 Around the Clock Support
[] Dual Quad Core Amd Servers
[] 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
[] Free Backup Storage within the VPS control Panel.
[] Instant Free Remote Reboots within the VPS control Panel.
[] Instant Free OS reloads within the VPS control panel.
[] Instant Shutdown/power on your VPS server within the control panel.
[] Raid-1 protected hard drives. This means Zero down time in case of hardware failures.
[] 100Mbps & 1Gbps premium bandwidth speeds.
[] No Contracts (Cancel at anytime)
[] Upgrade or Downgrade Anytime
[] IPv4 & IPv6 technology!
[] FULL Root Access

Q: How long does it take to setup a VPS?
A: All services are instantly provisioned and setup after payment is received..

Q: What type of server are these VPS hosted on?
A: Quad Core AMD With 32GB RAM

Q. Can I upgrade or downgrade my account?
A. Yes, you may upgrade or downgrade your account anytime you like with just a click from clientarea.

Q. Can I host friends?
A. Yes, you may host your friends.

Q: Can you help transfer our data?
A: Yes we can do this as long as you have the data in a cPanel or DirectAdmin VPS.

Q: Where are your virtual servers located?
A: Covina, Ca (USA)

Why Choose Us:

Techni Host is reliable and trustworthy. We have the power and knowledge to provide our clients with the services that we promise. We have been in the business for longer then just a few months. Techni Host believes in quality over quantity! If you are not happy with our services, we will provide a full refund within the first 30 days of service with us.
